metadata.title: CVE-2023-50671 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In exiftags 1.01, nikon_prop1 in nikon.c has a heap-based buffer overflow(write of size 28) because snprintf can write to an unexpected address.

criterions.comment: exiftags: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
